titleStmt.title: A strange banquet: or, The devil's entertainment by Cook Laurel, at the Peak in Derby-shire; with an account of the several dishes served to table. To the tune of, Cook Laurel, &c.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W.O. for A.M. to be sold by J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-spur[-street],

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Cook Laurel would have the devil his guest ..."
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Cf. Wing J1013 which has "divels" in the title.
L copy trimmed and torn with partial loss of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
